description: This file defines a data model class 'ChatMessage' used for representing chat messages in the application. It uses json_serializable annotations for JSON serialization/deserialization.

classes.name: ChatMessage
classes.description: A model class representing a chat message with properties for id, userId, message content, and timestamp, along with JSON serialization support.

methods.name: ChatMessage.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a ChatMessage instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts a ChatMessage instance to a JSON map.
